name: @tpmjs/tools-supabase
description: Supabase REST API tools for AI agents â€” query, insert, update, delete rows, call RPC functions, and more

env.name: SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
env.description: Supabase service role key for full database access

tools.name: queryRows
tools.description: Query rows from a Supabase table with filtering, ordering, and pagination.

tools.name: getRowById
tools.description: Get a single row from a Supabase table by its primary key value.

tools.name: insertRows
tools.description: Insert one or more rows into a Supabase table and return the inserted data.

tools.name: updateRows
tools.description: Update rows in a Supabase table matching a PostgREST filter condition.

tools.name: deleteRows
tools.description: Delete rows from a Supabase table matching a PostgREST filter condition.

tools.name: upsertRows
tools.description: Insert or update rows in a Supabase table using merge-duplicates strategy.

tools.name: callRpc
tools.description: Call a Supabase PostgreSQL function (RPC) with optional parameters.

tools.name: countRows
tools.description: Count rows in a Supabase table, optionally filtered by conditions.

tools.name: listTables
tools.description: List all available tables in the Supabase database via the OpenAPI schema.

tools.name: searchRows
tools.description: Search rows in a Supabase table using case-insensitive pattern matching.
